snippet: Coach Les Miles said that Tyrann Mathieu, the Tigers’ most dynamic player, violated team rules, but he was not more specific.
abstract: Louisiana State defensive back Tyrann Mathieu, a Heisman Trophy finalist in 2011, is dismissed from the football team for violating an unspecified athletic department rule.
lead_paragraph: Coach Les Miles said that Tyrann Mathieu, the Tigers’ most dynamic player, violated team rules, but he was not more specific.

headline.seo: Tyrann Mathieu Is Off L.S.U.’s Football Team
headline.main: Heisman Finalist From L.S.U. Is Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Heisman Finalist From L.S.U. Is Dismissed
